text: 1:30 Jeremaia 23:5-6; Jon 17:19; 2 Korin 5:21God uabɨ ia gamizɨ, ia Krais Iesus ko poroghav iti. Ezɨ a Krais gamizɨ, a en nɨghnɨzir aghuimɨn mɨngarimɨn iti. Ezɨ Kraisɨn ingangarimɨn, God e gamizɨma, e Godɨn damazimɨn deragha, God baghavɨra iti. Ezɨ Kraisɨn ingangarimɨn, a uam e givezegha, arazir kuramɨn gavgavimɨn e fɨri.
